name: What if? (EdwardTReyes)
description: This game focuses on a feeling that some people might have. I don't want to spoil that feeling and would rather the player figure it out themselves. This game has a main player and is mainly focused around the games art to tell a story. My game is very linear, bringing the player on a path that they can just indulge. Trying to get some music for it, don't know if it will work. Otherwise, enjoy the game.
